text: The location was great the views at the restaurant were amazing. They need more vegetarian options for breakfast i e vegetarian sausages etc
There was hardly any chicken items All were either beef or pork My wife is a vegetarian there should be more vegetarian items as well
Room was clean Complimentary drinks was a good treat each day. Breakfast could have more vegetarian options Also restaurant menu could have more children s options and vegetarian choices
Cleanliness of room. Lack of Choice of vegetarian options for breakfast
Plenty to eat Very nice food. Non dairy vegetarian options limited
Near to Metro near to central areas. Limited vegetarian food in restaurant
Breakfast. No clock in swimming pool area No vegetarian sausage for breakfast
Service was impeccable. Restaurants at hotel did not have enough vegetarian options
The staff were friendly. The choice of hot vegetarian items in the breakfast
the vegetarian chef special was of poor inventiveness despite being build as creative
Free upgrade to Suite Clean Excellent service. Lack of vegetarian options in restaurant
It would be great if the had Gluten Free options and vegetarian sausages
Excellent property. No choice for a vegetarian meal for dinner at the restaurant
Awesome location and hospitality. Few more vegetarian options could have been provided in breakfast
Good location for our purposes and a good variety of vegetarian dishes for breakfast .
Good location for our purposes and a good variety of vegetarian dishes for breakfast .
Good location for our purposes and a good variety of vegetarian dishes for breakfast .
Very nice perfect location with a little fridge and its own gourmet vegetarian restaurant
Location Staff. Would have liked vegetarian hot breakfast and the mushrooms were freezing cold
Excellent location Value for money Very modern facilities and interior. No vegetarian food in breakfast
The bedroom was good and the bed comfortable The pub like atmosphere. The vegetarian breakfast
Very comfortable hotel Staff was very friendly. Breakfast was average Little or no vegetarian choise
vegetarian vegan food view from the balcony and talking to the chef Good access for wheelchairs
Breakfast was good Staff are very friendly Location is fantastic. Not many vegetarian options for food
Convenient location Besides the metro station U Bhan Krieau. Costly breakfast perticularly if you are vegetarian
Great staff who tried to resolve any concerns. Non functioning room fridge limited vegetarian menu options
I enjoyed the hospitality of the staff. The hotel need to have more options for vegetarian
The choice of food in the cafe. Not much selection of vegetarian in the Savannah restaurant
We felt very welcome The staff were brilliant nothing too much trouble. No vegetarian sausages or bacon
Excellent service and a breakfast buffet with plenty of choice for a vegetarian Well designed clean rooms
Comfy bed very good service a lot of breakfast options including gluten free and vegetarian Nice and helpful staff
The bed thebreakfast the friendly and helpful staff cleanliness and decor. Lack of vegetarian choice in the dinner menu
The staff are so helpful specially Zoe Thank you Zoe for all you help. Breakfast very limited for vegetarian
Huge property with a lot of history behind it Very friendly staff. More vegetarian options for in room dining
excellent help by staff to suggest places and move around truly genius. would have preferred few vegetarian options for breakie
Very hepful staff nice spread of breakfast and proximity to the heart of the city. Breakfast hardly had vegetarian items
Location is great rooms were comfortable pleasant stay. No or limited vegetarian food in the restaurants and room service menu
the room was perfect. There was no vegetarian option the range of breads were limited and the bagels were stale
The room was really well equipped clean and comfy. No pool at the location restaurant menu isn t vegetarian freindly
location concierge services by reception staff co operation. No airport pickup and drop no vegetarian breakfast which was included in costing
Warm cookie on arrival Varitey of vegetarian options at breakfast buffet Friendly staff Great location Train station 2 min walk away
Location is so great Full English Breakfast can tailor made for vegetarian very considerated Will come back and stay here again
Lovely breakfast The quiche was outstanding Quality offerings for every taste Plenty of vegetarian dishes also Delightful atmosphere and gracious staff
Room interior was classy staff was super friendly helpful and very kind. Breakfast can be better and can add vegetarian meals
Great comfortable rooms Excellent Service Lounge service is good Had nice time. Vegetarian options are limited request you to add more options
All the Staff and the room. No much on the menu for vegetarian Had hoped for some more Italian dishes like Pasta
Value for money in an ideal location. A comment made by a staff member that the vegetarian sausages were Halal that I ordered
Location vegetarian food. Had no idea when booking it was an alcohol free venue Not all vegetarians are totally pure on their hols
The buffet breakfast was quite good and access to public transport was most convenient. More vegetarian options on the menu would be nice
The location is amazing The colors and the modernity of the rooms hotel are wonderful. More choices for the breakfast for vegetarian persons
Everything was good. Vegetarian Breakfast Overall breakfast was brilliant However I am guessing that is quite normal unless the hotel explicitly specifies such
2 minute walk from tube makes it a convenient hotel Nicely decorated room with comfy bed and extremely clean Vegetarian breakfast 1st class
Very close to milano centrale station Person at reception in afternoon is very helpful really very cool guy. No vegetarian food available in breakfast
Beds very comfy like the coffee machines in the rooms. Breakfast overall good but as a vegetarian would have liked more cheese fish options
Very friendly well located and good vegetarian options for breakfast Spacious rooms and very clean well kept and furnished. Wifi should be complimentary across
Clean comfortable and value for money. Being a vegetarian I wanted something hot for breakfast but lacked a few veggies other then that very satisfied
It was neat and clean and staff were helpful and friendly. Way too pricey for the facilities and restaurant didn t have much vegetarian options
This is my second stay at krasnopolsky because I liked it the first time Location of course along with helpful and courteous staff. Poor vegetarian menu
Staff really helpful couldn t do enough for us Good location Lovely hotel with quite unique features. Need to upgrade vegetarian breakfast or adjust price accordingly
Very comfy bed spacious room and lovely TV Short distance from the sites on the tube and shopping doorstep. They need some more vegetarian options at breakfast
